content.query:
DROP PROCEDURE [StandardizedBank].[ProcedureCustomer]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [StandardizedBank].[ProcedureCustomer] (@ETL_DATE INT)
AS
BEGIN

TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[H_CUSTOMER];

INSERT INTO [Standardized].[H_CUSTOMER] (
[Customer HashKey]
,[Customer Number]
,[Record Source]
,[Load Date]
)
SELECT Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER' + '-' + ID) AS [Customer HashKey]
,ID AS [Customer Number]
,'LandingBank.Customer' AS [Record Source]
,CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date] FROM [LandingBank].[Customer]
WHERE DATA_DATE= @ETL_DATE;
END

-------
GO
